snippet: Four decades ago the near-impeachment of Richard Nixon rocked the nation. Several books and television programs are reviewing his presidency and its scandals.
abstract: White House Memo; conservatives' talks of impeachment these days serve as a reminder that 40 years after Pres Richard M Nixon resigned in the face of impending impeachment, nation he left behind is still struggling to define the contours of presidential power and the nature of political accountability; series of new books, documentaries and other media events are planned for anniversary of Nixon's fall.
lead_paragraph: Four decades ago the near-impeachment of Richard Nixon rocked the nation. Several books and television programs are reviewing his presidency and its scandals.

headline.seo: Richard Nixon’s Tenure and Downfall Are Reassessed
headline.main: 40 Years Later, Still Trying to Define Presidential Power
headline.print_headline: 40 Years Later, Still Trying to Define Presidential Power
